1.instruction: Create a comprehensive Product Requirements Document (PRD) for an AI-powered face analysis and cosmetics recommendation platform. The platform should include: 1) Face detection and analysis capabilities, 2) Cosmetics recommendation engine, 3) Health suggestions based on facial analysis, 4) Photo and video upload functionality in AI chatbot, 5) Technical requirements for CNNs, facial landmark extraction, temporal feature analysis, and facial action units. Include market research on similar platforms, competitive analysis, user personas, and detailed feature specifications.

2.instruction: Design the complete system architecture for the AI face analysis platform based on the PRD. Include: 1) Frontend architecture with React/TypeScript components, 2) Backend API design with face detection endpoints, 3) AI/ML pipeline architecture for CNNs, facial landmark detection, and feature extraction, 4) Database schema for user data, analysis results, and recommendations, 5) File upload and processing workflow for photos/videos, 6) Integration points between frontend, backend, and AI services. Output detailed system design document.

3.instruction: Implement the complete AI face analysis and cosmetics recommendation platform based on the system design. Include: 1) Frontend with React/TypeScript using Shadcn-ui and Tailwind CSS, 2) Backend API with face detection, analysis, and recommendation endpoints, 3) AI chatbot with photo/video upload capabilities, 4) Face detection and alignment algorithms, 5) CNN-based feature extraction, 6) Cosmetics recommendation engine, 7) Health suggestion system, 8) Database integration for storing analysis results. Rename the platform from "Brain Wave" to a suitable name for face analysis and cosmetics.
